title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to login with correct credentials.

title: Payment Error
description: Payment is failing during checkout.

title: Feature Request
description: User requested dark mode feature.

title: Bug Report
description: Dashboard data not loading properly.

title: Account Suspension
description: User account was suspended without notice.

title: API Integration
description: Third-party API integration not working.

title: Data Migration
description: Old system data not migrated correctly.

title: Performance Issue
description: Website is slow during peak hours.

title: UI Glitch
description: Button alignment broken on mobile.

title: Security Concern
description: Suspicious login attempts detected.

title: Notification Failure
description: Email notifications not being sent.

title: Password Reset
description: Users unable to reset their passwords.

title: Subscription Issue
description: Subscription not renewing automatically.

title: Data Export
description: CSV export generates incomplete data.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: App crashes when opening settings page.

title: Search Bug
description: Search results are not showing relevant items.

title: Profile Update
description: Users cannot update profile information.

title: Connectivity Issue
description: Server connectivity intermittent during peak traffic.

title: Invoice Generation
description: Invoices are not generated correctly for some orders.

title: Email Bounce
description: Transactional emails bouncing for certain domains.
